due_date.title: Is this quote required for a specific date?

brokerSurvey_OrderDirectApplicantWhomWhy.title: If No, from whom and why

brokerSurvey_riskRenewalToOfficeHowLong.title: If yes, how long have you placed this risk

declined_or_cancelled_detail.title: If Yes, please provide full details

comm_or_home.title: Is this a Commercial or Home Daycare?

ops_totalGrossAnnualReceipts.title: What are the estimated annual receipts?

risk_address_noOfClaims.title: Number of claims reported for application of insurance on your behalf or on behalf of any your principals, firm partners, officers, employees, predecessors in past 5 years? *

risk_address_incidenceInClaim.title: Are you aware of any incidence that may result in a Loss? *

claimHistory_abuseEmploymentDisclosure.title: I have no knowledge of any past or pending claims against my company with respect to abuse including allegations of sexual abuse, or, any other employment practices violations including wrongful dismissal and discrimination. *

ECE_yes_or_no.title: Do staff have Earliy Childhood Education (ECE) designation or equivalent?  *

background_checks_yes_or_no.title: Are background checks performed on all staff?  *

staff_fully_immunized.title: Are all staff fully immunized? (TB, COVID, Etc.) *

first_aid_cert_onSite.title: Is someone always onsite with a valid first aid certificate?*

emergencyPlan_in_place.title: Is there an emergency plan in place and staff are trained in it? (Fires, Hold & Secures, Lockdowns)*

guidelines_follow_isolating.title: Are government guidelines follow in regards to isolating sick children to prevent the spread of infectious diseases?*

meal_served.title: Are meals served on the premises? *

type_of_food.title: Advise the type of food that you offer (i.e. soup, sandwiches, hot meals, snacks, etc.):

special_med_accommodation.title: Do any of your clients require special medical accommodation? *

clients_care_overnight.title: Do any clients remain in the organization’s care overnight? *

rules_pickup_delivery.title: What are the rules relative to delivery or pick-up of children when parents or guardians are delayed and unable to pick children up on time?

safe_materials.title: Are all play materials safe, non-breakable and non-toxic? *

incidents_written_record_kept.title: Are written records kept of all incidents relating to any child?  *

medical_issues_documentation.title: Is there detailed written documentation outlining each child's allergies and other medical issues?  *

med_doctor_notes.title: Are all medications required, even over the counter meds, accompanied by a doctor's note with dosages, times, signs, and symptoms? (This includes, but is not limited to; Epi-pens, Tylenol, anti-biotics, etc.) *

building_modified.title: Has the building been modified in any way to accommodate a daycare/childcare operation?

suitable_and_equipped.title: Are the premises suitable and properly equipped for this type of occupancy? *

facility_location.title: Where in the building is the facility located? *

num_of_exits.title: Number of exits in the building *

fire_alarms_yes_or_no.title: Does the building have fire alarms?*

playground_or_equipment.title: Is there a playground or playground equipment located on the premises for use by the Daycare? *

supervised_by_staff_in_ratio.title: Are play areas contently supervised by the required number of staff (in ratio) *

access_to_restricted.title: How is access to the play area restricted? (i.e. fence, gate, concrete or brick walls, etc.) *

pet_on_prem_yes_or_no.title: Are there any pets on premises? *

pets_desc.title: Please provide full list of all pets on premises (for dogs, provide specific breed) *

daycare_transportation.title: Does the daycare provide transportation for the children?*

cgl_cglLimitsOfLiablitiy.title: Which CGL limits of liability are required?(Per Claim/Aggregate)  *

filesRequired: A copy of Blank Form that records all incidents relating to any child
